none.name: No Handle
none.description: Do not include a handle on this board.

shaped.name: Shaped Handle
shaped.description: A Beautiful shaped handle will be added to this board.

stainless.name: Stainless Handle
stainless.description: A Beautiful stainless handle will be added to this board.

dado.name: Dadoed Handle
dado.description: A Beautiful dado handle will be added to this board.

turned.name: Turned Handle
turned.description: A Beautiful turned handle will be added to this board.

elk-horn.name: Elk Horn Handle
elk-horn.description: A Beautiful elk horn handle will be added to this board.

inner.name: Inner Groove
inner.description: If your board uses different wood types around the edges, we'll make sure your juice groove is contained inside those strips.

outer.name: Outer Groove
outer.description: We'll run your juice groove all the way to the edge of the cutting board.

none.name: No Groove
none.description: Board will be flat with no routed groove.

screw.name: Screw-In
screw.description: Permanent rubber screw-in feet keep board steadily in place.

suction.name: Suction Cup
suction.description: Four low-profile suction cup feet placed under the board. Non-destructive feet allow for dual sided use.

button.name: Buttons
button.description: Flat 1/8" stainless endcaps in your choice of color.

nutcover.name: Nut Covers
nutcover.description: 1" hefty threaded nut-covers in stainless steel.

none.name: No Branding
none.description: Your endcaps will be blank and devoid of any fancy logos.

pineclifflogo.name: PineCliff Logo
pineclifflogo.description: Show your support with a PineCliff Woodworks logo emblazoned on one of the endcaps.

pcwartlogo.name: PCW Art Logo
pcwartlogo.description: Show your inner fanboy with the new PCW Art logo on one of your endcaps.

chooseapattern.name: Various Patterns
chooseapattern.description: Select a logo or pattern from our curated list of custom images.
